content:
Please could I request a review - or at least some comments on the direction of travel - for https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib/pull/18448 ? Thanks.

Christopher
I left some boring stylistic comments, I'm afraid someone else will have to review the mathematics

@Yaël Dillies said:

All prerequisites are ported. Would you mind closing this PR and reopening it on the mathlib4 side, so that we have one less file to port?

I don't really agree with this policy being sensible; if there's already a mathlib3 PR that passes CI and doesn't touch any ported files, what's the benefit of asking the author to manually port it to mathlib4 when we could just merge then auto-port it?
Autoporting then merging is strictly less work than merging then autoporting, right?
In that case, it looks like Christopher ported the file by hand, but hopefully we will learn how to tame mathport one shot.

Yaël Dillies said:

Autoporting then merging is strictly less work than merging then autoporting, right?

They should be the same amount of work, but the autoporting on the LHS currently has a big asterisk by it
